The first edition of the Convergences Tunisia Forum “Towards a Zero Carbon, Zero Exclusion, Zero Poverty (3Zero) Tunisia” highlighted the importance of the social economy for the country’s sustainable and inclusive development. Last year, nearly 500 of you drew together the outlines of a 3Zero Tunisia.

The second edition wentfurther in the reflection and creation of tools to promote the Sustainable Development Goals and the transition to a 3Zero Tunisia around the theme “Social economy and Transitions in Tunisia”.

The preparation of a third edition of the Convergences Tunisia Forum, more ambitious and focused on regions, inclusion and Social economy has started! The Forum will take place on 25 March 2020 at the Tunis Arena on the theme “Social economy in action for a Tunisia Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty”.

PARTNERS OF THE 2019 EDITION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Thank you to the first partners of the 2019 Forum Convergences Tunisia for their support and mobilization. Join them and demonstrate your commitment to a 3Zero Tunisia!

Carbon neutrality

Carbon emissions due to the organisation of the Convergences Tunisia Forum are assessed and fully offset by EcoAct, partner of the event’s carbon neutrality.

excerpt.rendered: The first edition of the Convergences Tunisia Forum “Towards a Zero Carbon, Zero Exclusion, Zero Poverty (3Zero) Tunisia” highlighted the importance of the social economy for the country’s sustainable and inclusive development. Last year, nearly 500 of you drew together the outlines of a 3Zero Tunisia. The second edition wentfurther in the reflection and creation […]
